TopicTitle: (VTOL Jet) Belle PASAS Mk IIIW by Zokesia Skunkworks!

Articles.Content:
The Belle is a great VTOL jet for the budding jock. Easy to control. Has RCS but it isn't necessary to hover, only used for emergency.

Download: http://www./download/ec90aa0aqjlq0ce/Belle_PASAS_MK_IIIW.craft

Vertical control:

Roll to strafe left or right

Pitch for forward and back (nose down= forward nose up= backward)

Yaw to turn aircraft nose in place.

Vertical Throttle should be at 80% to hover, 70% to decend.

ACTION GROUPS

"2" for Horizontal Jets

"3" for lift jet

"0" for missiles (2)

Gallery:

Hovering

Demonstrating water capability

Soft landing

Hey zekes, your space center seems to be massively more populated than mine in terms of structures. Is that a mod or something? Nice VTOL by the way.

P.S. show me some more of that sexy little biplane in the back =D

The buildings are part of Kerbtown, a plugin/mod to add buildings.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46643-Kerbin-City-Community-Project-phase-A-and-B

That plane's the doublegull.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24534-Zokesia-Skunkworks-%28Celebrating-1000-posts%21%29?p=617816&viewfull=1#post617816

Edited August 30, 2013 by zekes
@ Zekes - You are a master of aircraft. Amazing, brilliant!

thanks much!

Also i have a new version, the Mk IV, will be released soon. It has +5 degrees up in the cruise engines, which makes it fly much higher than before. Test runs put it at 2100 m/s and 34,000 meters. The Mk IV retains the twin missiles and VTOL capability of the old Mk IIIW

(for reference the Mk IIIW can only go to 1800 m/s and 19,000 meters )
